resources.string:
Sesame Street Adding Lyrics Song: 
 Adding is putting together, hmmm 
 Adding is just what you do 
 If I have one cookie and you have one cookie 
 Together they add up to two 
 One cookie and one cookie makes two cookies 
 One and one is two 
 That is two, whoo
Learning Addition: \r\n Addition is one of the few things we learn in school that we are actually asked to put into use every day of our lives. Luckily, it is easy to learn how to add.
